definition: (of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: This article introduces the Data Collecting System in the Multi-function Car for Test and Inspection of Vehicles in Specific Sites and Area.
sentences.chinese: 介紹廠內機動車輛綜合檢測車的數據檢測採集系統。

sentences.english: A motor vehicle which reaches the standards for being discarded as unserviceable shall not run on road.
sentences.chinese: 達到報廢標準的機動車不得上道路行駛。

sentences.english: Set of bollards for blocking vehicle access.
sentences.chinese: 阻止機動車通行的一組安全島護柱。

sentences.english: Don't you smell the gas from the motors all around the streets?
sentences.chinese: 難道你沒有在街上聞到從機動車上排出來的氣體嗎？

sentences.english: Any other vehicle on which exemption is granted on the approval of the Provincial TLIA.
sentences.chinese: 經省交通徵費稽查機構覈准免徵的其他機動車。

sentences.english: Cars will be restricted based on the odd and even number rule for 46 days, starting today.
sentences.chinese: 在此期間，有46天將實行機動車單雙號限行。

sentences.english: The motor and garage trades will be harmed.
sentences.chinese: 機動車買賣和車輛修理業也將受損。

sentences.english: Non- motorized access will be in the "three vertical and three horizontal" peripheral gradually open up.
sentences.chinese: 非機動車通道將在“三橫三縱”的周邊陸續開闢。

sentences.english: The second generation of greenway is characterized by trail-oriented and non-motorized travel.
sentences.chinese: 第二代綠道以步道和非機動車通行爲特點。

sentences.english: This method is especially suitable to measurement of exhaust gas of vehicle by roadside.
sentences.chinese: 該方法尤其適合機動車道邊附近的測量。

sentences.english: And all of those hard working people down at the DMV need to be paid, too.
sentences.chinese: 那些在機動車部門勤勤懇懇工作的人也需要得到報酬。

sentences.english: The utility model discloses an oxyhydrogen catalysis combustion-supporting environmental-protection fuel economizer of a motor vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 一種機動車氫氧催化助燃環保節油器。

sentences.english: The first part is brief theory introduction to compulsory insurance system for motor vehicle traffic accidents.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分爲國內外機動車交強險制度的發展概況。

sentences.english: If he does not accept the penalty within the time limit without any justifiable reason, his motor vehicle driving license shall be revoked.
sentences.chinese: 無正當理由逾期未接受處理的，吊銷機動車駕駛證。

sentences.english: They wanted new non-motorized routes of travel.
sentences.chinese: 他們需要新的非機動車交通路線。

sentences.english: Dangers like speedy motorized vehicles are newcomers on the landscape of life.
sentences.chinese: 快速行駛的機動車之類的危險是生活畫卷中的新生物。

definition: to travel along a route (of vehicles etc)
